p: The first recrudescent case was reported in week 17, 14, 16 since the last case in Guinea, Liberia, Sierra Leone, respectively. It should be noted that the last observed actual recrudescent event in Guinea was in the week 20, and the gap period between the last observed recrudescence and the week of the end derived from our model (week 19) was only 1 week ( Fig. 1 A). In addition, the gap period between the last declaration (week 25) and the calculated end of the epidemic from our model (week 28) was 3 weeks in Sierra Leone ( Fig. 1E). The purported last case reported in week 34 in Liberia before the second declaration was 3 weeks earlier than our suggested week (week 37) in Fig. 1C.
